name: @eduvault/root
description: Eduvault let's learners own their own data. It helps app builders quickly create user-owned databases that sync and interoperate. Home page at eduvault.org

scripts.make-certs: cd deploy/dev-certs && mkcert api.localhost && cp api.localhost-key.pem api.localhost.key && cp api.localhost.pem api.localhost.crt && mkcert app.localhost && cp app.localhost-key.pem app.localhost.key && cp app.localhost.pem app.localhost.crt && mkcert example.localhost && cp example.localhost-key.pem example.localhost.key && cp example.localhost.pem example.localhost.crt && mkcert home.localhost && cp home.localhost-key.pem home.localhost.key && cp home.localhost.pem home.localhost.crt
scripts.make-prod-certs: mkdir deploy/prod-certs ; cd deploy/prod-certs && sudo certbot certonly --standalone -d is-a-test.xyz -d app.is-a-test.xyz -d api.is-a-test.xyz -d home.is-a-test.xyz -d example.is-a-test.xyz
scripts.copy-dev-build-certs: cd deploy/dev-certs && cp /etc/letsencrypt/live/is-a-test.xyz-0001/fullchain.pem is-a-test.xyz.crt && cp /etc/letsencrypt/live/is-a-test.xyz-0001/privkey.pem is-a-test.xyz.key
scripts.copy-prod-certs: cd deploy/prod-certs && cp /etc/letsencrypt/live/is-a-test.xyz-0001/fullchain.pem is-a-test.xyz.crt && cp /etc/letsencrypt/live/is-a-test.xyz-0001/privkey.pem is-a-test.xyz.key
scripts.link-all: yarn build:shared && yarn link:shared && yarn build:sdk-js && yarn link:sdk-js
scripts.unlink:shared: cd ./app && yarn unlink @eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn unlink @eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn unlink @eduvault/shared
scripts.remove:shared: cd ./app && yarn remove @eduvault/shared && rimraf node_modules/@eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn remove @eduvault/shared && rimraf node_modules/@eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn remove @eduvault/shared && rimraf node_modules/@eduvault/shared
scripts.re-inst:shared: cd ./app && yarn add @eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn add @eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn add @eduvault/shared
scripts.link:shared: cd ./shared && yarn link && cd ../app && yarn link @eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn link @eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn link @eduvault/shared
scripts.link:sdk-js: cd ./sdk/js && yarn link && cd ../../example && yarn link @eduvault/eduvault-js
scripts.push-build:app: docker-compose -f docker-compose-build.yml build app && docker push jewcub/eduvault_app:latest
scripts.push-build:api: docker-compose -f docker-compose-build.yml build api && docker push jewcub/eduvault_api:latest
scripts.push-build:example: docker-compose -f docker-compose-build.yml build example && docker push jewcub/eduvault_example:latest
scripts.push-build:home-page: docker-compose -f docker-compose-build.yml build home-page && docker push jewcub/eduvault_home-page:latest
scripts.m1-push-build:app: cd app && yarn build && docker buildx build -t jewcub/eduvault_app:latest --file Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage --platform linux/amd64 --push .
scripts.m1-push-build:api: cd api && docker buildx build -t jewcub/eduvault_api:latest --file Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage --platform linux/amd64 --push .
scripts.m1-push-build:example: cd example && yarn build && docker buildx build -t jewcub/eduvault_example:latest --file Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage --platform linux/amd64 --push .
scripts.m1-push-build:home-page: cd home-page && docker buildx build -t jewcub/eduvault_home-page:latest --file Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage --platform linux/amd64 --push .
scripts.republish: run-s publish:shared remove:shared link-replace:shared publish:sdk-js remove:sdk-js link-replace:sdk-js
scripts.d-vols-clean: docker-compose down --remove-orphans && docker volume rm eduvault_example-dist-share eduvault_dist-share eduvault_example-dist-share
scripts.production: docker-compose -f docker-compose-digital-ocean.yml down --remove-orphans ; docker-compose -f docker-compose-digital-ocean.yml up --build -d
